turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order a coffee drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Which location would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order from the location on Flower Mound Road in Flower Mound.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. And what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order one Cinnamon Dolce Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And would you prefer it to be a short, tall, grande, or venti size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to get the Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what type of milk would you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to get whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. And would you like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I will go without the whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. And is there anything else I can get you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that should be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I have an order of one grande Cinnamon Dolce Latte with whole milk and no whipped cream. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, it is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I will place that order for you now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order should be ready within the next 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. The receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Have a good rest of the day.
